directions: Mix yogurt, tahini, vinegar, parsley, lemon juice, garlic, paprika, water, cayenne pepper, and salt in a bowl until smooth.
ingredients: 1/3 cup tahini, or more to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
1/2 lemon, juiced, or more to taste
1 teaspoon paprika, or more to taste
1 teaspoon water, or more as needed
title: Tahini BBQ Sauce
